text: Roi Yosef Levy (; 29 May 1979 – 7 October 2023) was an colonel in the Israel Defense Forces (IDF) who worked in the Multidimensional Unit. He was killed in the battle of Re'im during an encounter with Palestinian militants during the Israel–Hamas war. == Related pages == * * * Battle of Re'im * Re'im music festival massacre * == References == Category:2023 deaths Category:1970s births Category:7 October attacks Category:Israeli military people Category:Deaths in the Israel-Hamas war
title: Roi Levy
